attributes.action: bring my four children home lost too social services,false adoption
attributes.additional_details: Due... too domestic violence relationship supposed neglect my children due too anxiety depression no fault my own just over domineering ex partner my children got taken care September 2014 nearly 6 months care my social worker decide make it official that children shall be goin too adoption . I've done as requested via them since children been care seemed counselling,medication etc my state of mind has improved and I'm aware path in which I'm suppose too take keep my children safe but been denied this not only are they breaking my family unit apart there destroying other peoples lives by takin drastic action just because they have the power shouldn't give them ammunition too false take children for own satisfaction.no explanation is barely given all the try do is comfort u in process takin your children when children should be reunited with parents understood if I abused my children etc but that's not the case just discrimination.
